hey folks its me again: I'm using kubuntu here (no ones talking in #kubuntu atm) and I'm trying to shut down X so I can install my nvidia driver, but it keeps restarting X everytime I do ctrl-alt-backspace... anyone know what to do ?
I've asked in #kubuntu but no ones chatting, so I thought I'd ask in here
Ctl+Alt+F1 ; login ; sudo /etc/init.d/kdm stop ; do what you need ; sudo /etc/init.d/kdm start
